content.query:
IF OBJECT_ID('tempdb..#TempTable') IS  NULL
 BEGIN
 CREATE TABLE #TempTable
    (
     [doc] nvarchar(4000) 
    )
WITH
    (    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
     CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
     -- HEAP
    )

COPY INTO #TempTable  
 
	FROM 'https://nithindatalakestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/salesforce/jsonfiles/user.json'
	WITH (
      
		FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
		,fieldterminator ='0x0b'
        ,fieldquote = '0x0b'
        ,rowterminator = '0x0A'   
		,CREDENTIAL=(IDENTITY= 'Managed Identity')        
	)
  END
; 
  with SalesForceJsonData_CT 
   as  ( 
SELECT  
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.id') AS id, 
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.name') AS name,
  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.username') AS username,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.email') AS email,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.street') AS street,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.suite') AS suite,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.address.zipcode') AS zipcode,
    JSON_VALUE(doc,'$.address.geo.lat') as Lat,
    JSON_VALUE(doc,'$.address.geo.lng') as lng,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.phone') AS phone,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.website') AS website,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.name') AS companyname,
    JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.catchPhrase') AS catchPhrase,
   JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.company.bs') AS bs   
FROM dbo.#TempTable)

select * from SalesForceJsonData_CT
